content: चातुर्वर्ण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चतुर्वण-ष्यञ्] Suited to the four tribes, or belonging to them. --र्ण्यं {@--1@} The aggregate of the four original castes of the Hindus; एवं सामासिकं धर्मं चातुर्वर्ण्ये ऽब्रवीन्मनुः <ls>Ms. 10. 63</ls>; <ls>Bg. 4. 13.</ls> {@--2@} The duties of these four castes.
